details: Errors in the operation of the site
A problem that is not included in any of the proposed services
Granting access to another employee's mailbox

open.author: Tommy Hudson
open.text: I have problems accessing the company's network. I can't connect to the server.

open.author: Salvador Montgomery
open.text: My computer won't boot, a blue error screen appears.

open.author: Bonnie Moody
open.text: I can't connect to the Wi-Fi network in the office. I ask for help

open.author: Sarah Jensen
open.text: I can't access network folders. I'm asking for help.

open.author: Marie Thompson
open.text: I have problems with the printer. He's not typing. Please help me.

open.author: Jessie Walsh
open.text: My computer freezes after startup. What should I do?

open.author: Alice Gonzales
open.text: I can't connect to the VPN. I'm asking for help.

open.author: Karl Robertson
open.text: My email inbox is full. We need to increase its volume.

open.author: Edith Wright
open.text: I cannot install new software on my computer. Please help me.

open.author: Kevin Crawford
open.text: I can't access the shared folder on the server. Please check the access settings.

open.author: Crystal Wright
open.text: My computer does not boot after updating the operating system. Please help me.

open.author: Richard Smith
open.text: Video conferencing does not work on the work computer.

open.author: David Chavez
open.text: The printer does not work in the office.

closed.author: Frederick Price
closed.text: I can't send an email. The mail client issues an error when connecting to the server.

closed.author: Michael Anderson
closed.text: I'm having problems with my network connection. I often lose my connection, which leads to interruptions in my work and slows down my productivity.

closed.author: Nicole Garcia
closed.text: There is a problem with the internet speed on my work computer. The page loading speed is very slow, which makes it difficult to complete tasks. Please check the connection and take measures to improve the speed.

closed.author: Alice Fuller
closed.text: On the last update of the operating system, there were problems with the operation of the time tracking application. The application crashes some time after launch. It is necessary to correct this error.

closed.author: Dennis Ward
closed.text: Please install new database software on my computer. It is necessary to have access to the latest updates and functionality of the program.

closed.author: Marie Thompson
closed.text: I have a problem with the printer. When printing documents, an error message appears on the screen and printing is not performed. Please check the printer status and fix this problem.

closed.author: Charles Cruz
closed.text: The sound is not working on my computer. There is no sound signal when trying to play audio files or videos. Please check the sound settings and restore the audio system to working order.

closed.author: James Jenkins
closed.text: I'm having trouble with my email settings. Errors occur when sending and receiving emails and it is impossible to establish a connection to the mail server. Please help me set up the email client.

closed.author: Lisa Brewer
closed.text: I ask for help with installing and configuring a new network printer. You need to connect it to the network and configure it to print from my workplace.

closed.author: Richard Smith
closed.text: I'm having trouble connecting to a Wi-Fi network. Although the network signal is displayed, the connection cannot be established. Please check your network settings and help you connect to Wi-Fi.

closed.author: Barbara Clark
closed.text: I have a problem with displaying images in my email. When opening emails with pictures, they are not displayed, instead only empty frames are visible. Please help us solve this problem.

closed.author: Edna Reyes
closed.text: Difficulties arise when trying to connect to the Internet on a workstation. The connection is not established, despite the correct data entered. Please check the connection and help to fix this problem.

closed.author: Emily Rodriguez
closed.text: I have problems with the monitor. The image on the screen flickers and sometimes disappears for a few seconds. Please check the connection of the monitor and help in solving this problem.

motivated_refusals.author: Margaret Pearson
motivated_refusals.text: My computer freezes when running a certain program. Help is needed to fix this problem.

motivated_refusals.author: John Reed
motivated_refusals.text: I have problems connecting to Wi-Fi in the office. The signal is too weak and unstable.

motivated_refusals.author: Michael Turner
motivated_refusals.text: The USB ports are not working on my work computer. When I connect the devices, they are not recognized and are not displayed in the system. Please check the ports and help with their recovery.

motivated_refusals.author: Sophia Campbell
motivated_refusals.text: I have a problem accessing cloud storage. When I try to upload files, the process takes a very long time and is often interrupted. Please check your connection to the cloud and help solve this problem.

motivated_refusals.author: James Richardson
motivated_refusals.text: I have a problem with the laptop charger working. When I plug it in, the laptop does not charge and only runs on battery power. Please check the performance of the charger and help in its restoration.

open.author: Tommy Hudson
open.text: I have problems accessing the company's network. I can't connect to the server.

open.author: Salvador Montgomery
open.text: My computer won't boot, a blue error screen appears.

open.author: Bonnie Moody
open.text: I can't connect to the Wi-Fi network in the office. I ask for help

open.text: I have problems with the printer. He's not typing. Please help me.

closed.author: Dennis Ward

closed.text: I have a problem with the printer. When printing documents, an error message appears on the screen and printing is not performed. Please check the printer status and fix this problem.

closed.author: Charles Cruz
closed.text: The sound is not working on my computer. There is no sound signal when trying to play audio files or videos. Please check the sound settings and restore the audio system to working order.

closed.author: James Jenkins
closed.text: I'm having trouble with my email settings. Errors occur when sending and receiving emails and it is impossible to establish a connection to the mail server. Please help me set up the email client.

closed.author: Lisa Brewer
closed.text: I ask for help with installing and configuring a new network printer. You need to connect it to the network and configure it to print from my workplace.

closed.author: Richard Smith
closed.text: I'm having trouble connecting to a Wi-Fi network. Although the network signal is displayed, the connection cannot be established. Please check your network settings and help you connect to Wi-Fi.

closed.author: Barbara Clark
closed.text: I have a problem with displaying images in my email. When opening emails with pictures, they are not displayed, instead only empty frames are visible. Please help us solve this problem.

closed.author: Edna Reyes
closed.text: Difficulties arise when trying to connect to the Internet on a workstation. The connection is not established, despite the correct data entered. Please check the connection and help to fix this problem.

closed.author: Emily Rodriguez
closed.text: I have problems with the monitor. The image on the screen flickers and sometimes disappears for a few seconds. Please check the connection of the monitor and help in solving this problem.

motivated_refusals.author: Margaret Pearson
motivated_refusals.text: My computer freezes when running a certain program. Help is needed to fix this problem.

motivated_refusals.author: John Reed
motivated_refusals.text: I have problems connecting to Wi-Fi in the office. The signal is too weak and unstable.

motivated_refusals.author: Michael Turner
motivated_refusals.text: The USB ports are not working on my work computer. When I connect the devices, they are not recognized and are not displayed in the system. Please check the ports and help with their recovery.

motivated_refusals.author: Sophia Campbell
motivated_refusals.text: I have a problem accessing cloud storage. When I try to upload files, the process takes a very long time and is often interrupted. Please check your connection to the cloud and help solve this problem.

motivated_refusals.author: James Richardson
motivated_refusals.text: I have a problem with the laptop charger working. When I plug it in, the laptop does not charge and only runs on battery power. Please check the performance of the charger and help in its restoration.

open.author: Patricia Patterson
open.text: There is a problem with the light in the office - one of the bulbs has burned out and needs to be replaced. It is quite difficult to work without proper lighting, so I ask you to solve this problem promptly.

open.author: David Chavez
open.text: There was a problem with the coffee machine in the dining room. The old coffee machine no longer provides high-quality coffee preparation and needs to be replaced. Please install a new coffee machine so that our employees can enjoy fresh and delicious coffee during breaks.

open.author: Bonnie Greer
open.text: It is necessary to carry out maintenance of air conditioners in the office.

open.author: Lawrence Walker
open.text: It is required to install a new office desk for an employee.

open.author: Karl Robertson
open.text: The office became unbearably hot due to a faulty air conditioner. The room temperature rises to unbearable values, which seriously interferes with work. Please replace the faulty air conditioner with a new one so that we can work in comfortable conditions.

open.author: Marie Sharp
open.text: A breakdown was found in the meeting room - one of the chairs broke. Now it is impossible to sit on it, which makes it difficult to hold important meetings. I ask you to repair the chair so that we can hold effective and comfortable meetings again.

open.author: Sally Palmer
open.text: There is a problem with the faucet in the toilet on the 3rd floor. It constantly drips, which creates inconvenience for employees and leads to unnecessary waste of water. Please replace the faulty faucet so that we can avoid additional costs and improve the conditions for using the toilet.

open.author: Richard Lee
open.text: Furniture needs to be updated in the office. Old tables and chairs have long lost their original appearance and are inconvenient for work. I ask you to replace the old furniture with new, modern and ergonomic ones in order to improve working conditions and increase the comfort of employees.

open.author: Michael Thompson
open.text: Better lighting is needed in the office. Some workplaces are in the shade and do not have sufficient lighting, which can negatively affect the eyesight and performance of employees. I ask you to install additional lamps and check the operation of existing ones to ensure uniform and bright lighting throughout the office.

open.author: Olivia Parker
open.text: New filing cabinets are required in the office. The existing cabinets are full, and we don't have enough space to store important documents and materials. I ask you to install several new cabinets to ensure sufficient space and the safety of documents.

open.author: Sophia Baker
open.text: New alarms need to be installed in the office. The existing alarm system is outdated and unreliable. Please install new alarms to ensure the security of the office and prevent possible incidents.

open.author: Ethan Harris
open.text: Wall painting is required in the office. The existing paint has peeled off and looks untidy. I ask you to paint all the walls in the office to create a fresh and pleasant look of the workspace.

open.author: Isabella Martinez
open.text: In the office, the flooring in the conference room needs to be replaced. The existing carpet is old, worn and has many stains. Please replace it with a new, stylish and easy-to-clean coating to create a pleasant atmosphere for meetings and presentations.

closed.author: Lisa Dean
closed.text: The office requires the installation of new curtains on the windows. The existing curtains are old, worn and unaesthetic. I ask you to install new curtains that will match the interior of the office and provide the necessary privacy and protection from sunlight.

closed.author: Amy Roberts
closed.text: It is required to install a new cooler system in warehouse No. 7.

closed.author: Benjamin Wright
closed.text: It is necessary to replace defective lamps in the corridor of the warehouse.

closed.author: Harper Foster
closed.text: The office requires the installation of new motion sensors in the corridors. Some sections of the corridors remain poorly lit, which creates a danger when employees move. I ask you to install motion sensors to automatically turn on the lighting when motion is detected in the corridor.

closed.author: Oliver Cooper
closed.text: New smoke and fire sensors need to be installed in the office. The existing system is outdated and does not provide reliable protection against possible fires. Please install new smoke and fire sensors to ensure the safety of employees and property.

closed.author: Emily Wilson
closed.text: The office requires the installation of new tables and chairs in the dining room. The existing furniture is old, worn out and uncomfortable to use. I ask you to replace the old furniture with new, comfortable and functional furniture to ensure a comfortable stay of employees in the dining room.

closed.author: Mia Roberts
closed.text: The heating system needs to be updated in the office. The existing system does not work efficiently, and in some rooms a comfortable temperature is not reached. I ask you to update the heating system to ensure uniform and comfortable heating of the entire office.

closed.author: Charlotte Murphy
closed.text: New sanitary rooms are required in the office. The existing offices are old, inconvenient and non-compliant with sanitary standards. I ask you to install new sanitary rooms to ensure comfortable and hygienic conditions for employees.

closed.author: James Thompson
closed.text: New radiators need to be installed in the office. The existing radiators are old and inefficient, which leads to uneven heating of the premises. Please install new radiators to ensure uniform and efficient heating throughout the office.

closed.author: Evelyn Clark
closed.text: New ventilation systems need to be installed in the office. The existing system does not provide sufficient air circulation and is inconvenient to use. Please install new ventilation systems to ensure fresh and comfortable air in the office.

closed.author: Samuel Rodriguez
closed.text: The office requires the installation of new entrance doors. The existing doors are old and have a lot of wear, which poses a security risk. I ask you to install new modern doors that ensure reliable protection and security of the office.

closed.author: Victoria Davis
closed.text: New suspended ceilings are required in the office. The existing ceilings are old, damaged and unaesthetic. Please install new suspended ceilings to create a modern and pleasant visual image of the office.

closed.author: Oliver Brown
closed.text: A new acoustic insulation system needs to be installed in the office. The existing system does not provide sufficient noise absorption, which leads to distracting background sounds and a decrease in employee concentration.I ask you to install a new acoustic insulation system to ensure silence and a comfortable working environment in the office.

motivated_refusals.author: Margaret Pearson
motivated_refusals.text: We have run out of office supplies, we need to order new ones.

motivated_refusals.author: John Reed
motivated_refusals.text: We need additional chairs for the meeting room. Please arrange the order.

motivated_refusals.author: Ava Turner
motivated_refusals.text: New glass partitions need to be installed in the office. The existing partitions are old and unaesthetic. Please install new glass partitions to create a modern and spacious visual image of the office.

motivated_refusals.author: Charlotte Adams
motivated_refusals.text: A new access control system needs to be installed in the office. The existing system does not provide sufficient security and access control to office premises. Please install a new access control system to ensure security and limited access for employees and visitors.

motivated_refusals.author: Isabella Martinez
motivated_refusals.text: Installation of new biodegradable waste containers is required on site. Existing containers are unecological and lead to environmental pollution. Please install new biodegradable waste containers to reduce our environmental footprint and keep the office clean.

open.author: Patricia Patterson
open.text: There is a problem with the light in the office - one of the bulbs has burned out and needs to be replaced. It is quite difficult to work without proper lighting, so I ask you to solve this problem promptly.

open.author: David Chavez
open.text: There was a problem with the coffee machine in the dining room. The old coffee machine no longer provides high-quality coffee preparation and needs to be replaced. Please install a new coffee machine so that our employees can enjoy fresh and delicious coffee during breaks.

motivated_refusals.author: Margaret Pearson
motivated_refusals.text: We have run out of office supplies, we need to order new ones.

motivated_refusals.author: John Reed
motivated_refusals.text: We need additional chairs for the meeting room. Please arrange the order.

motivated_refusals.author: Ava Turner
motivated_refusals.text: New glass partitions need to be installed in the office. The existing partitions are old and unaesthetic. Please install new glass partitions to create a modern and spacious visual image of the office.

motivated_refusals.author: Charlotte Adams
motivated_refusals.text: A new access control system needs to be installed in the office. The existing system does not provide sufficient security and access control to office premises. Please install a new access control system to ensure security and limited access for employees and visitors.

motivated_refusals.author: Isabella Martinez
motivated_refusals.text: Installation of new biodegradable waste containers is required on site. Existing containers are unecological and lead to environmental pollution. Please install new biodegradable waste containers to reduce our environmental footprint and keep the office clean.

open.author: Edna Reyes
open.text: We need to purchase new pallets for the warehouse. Please arrange this purchase.

open.author: Angela Martinez
open.text: We're out of duct tape and packing tape. I ask you to arrange the order of new materials.

open.author: Timothy Castillo
open.text: Hello, I would like to order a new laptop for work. My current laptop is already outdated and freezes frequently, making it difficult to complete my tasks. I was looking for a suitable model and would like to purchase a Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon laptop.

open.author: Kevin Crawford
open.text: Hello, I would like to order a new printer for our department. Our current printer often breaks down and requires frequent repairs, which leads to downtime. I was looking for a reliable printer model and would like to purchase an HP LaserJet Pro M 402 dn printer.

open.author: Gregory Davis
open.text: Hello, we are out of printer cartridges. We need to purchase new cartridges for the HP OfficeJet Pro 6978 model. Please help us with the order.

open.author: Nicole Garcia
open.text: Hello, I would like to order a new chair for my workplace. My current chair has already worn out and become uncomfortable to sit in. I would like to purchase a chair with an ergonomic design and back support.

open.author: Albert Martin
open.text: Hello, we need to purchase new forklifts for warehouse work. We need to purchase models with a load capacity of at least 5 tons.

open.author: Rick Brooks
open.text: We have a need to purchase new pallet trucks for convenient work in the warehouse.

open.author: Bernard Robinson
open.text: Hello, we need to order new trucks to expand our fleet. It is required to purchase trucks with a load capacity of at least 10 tons and a comfortable cab for the driver.

open.author: Alice Gonzales
open.text: Hello, we have run out of packaging materials for the goods. We need to purchase a large number of cardboard boxes of different sizes and packing tape.

open.author: Jennie Soto
open.text: We have a need to purchase new storage racks. Our current shelving cannot cope with the growing volume of goods. We would like to order racks with a large load capacity and the ability to adjust the shelves.

open.author: Sandra Johnson
open.text: Hello, we have a need to purchase new barcode scanners for warehouse work. Our current scanners are outdated and unreliable. We would like to order scanners with fast scanning and wireless data transfer capability.

open.author: Helen Nelson
open.text: Hello, we need to update our logistics management software. Our current software is outdated and does not provide effective management of cargo transportation and warehouse operations. We would like to order software with a wide range of functions and the ability to integrate with other systems.

closed.author: Justin Newman
closed.text: We need to purchase new loaders for the warehouse. Please arrange this purchase.

closed.author: Rodney Johnson
closed.text: We have a need to purchase new racks for the warehouse. Please help us arrange this purchase.

closed.author: Bonnie Greer
closed.text: We have a need to purchase new fork attachments for loaders in our warehouse. Our current types are worn out and do not provide reliable fastening of loads. We would like to order forks of various load capacities and suitable for handling various types of cargo.

closed.author: David Wright
closed.text: Good afternoon! We need to purchase a new crane to perform lifting operations in our warehouse. Our current crane is out of order and does not provide reliable movement of heavy loads. We would like to order a crane with a high load capacity and the ability to work in various conditions.

closed.author: Sarah Lewis
closed.text: Hello, we have a need to purchase new data collection terminals to optimize the operation of our warehouse. Our current terminals are outdated and do not provide efficient collection and transmission of cargo information. We would like to order terminals with high performance, long service life and the ability to integrate with our logistics system.

closed.author: Daniel Turner
closed.text: Our current system does not allow us to effectively control inventory, track the movement of goods and process orders. We would like to order a modern system with inventory, reporting and integration functions with our other systems.

closed.author: Christopher Hill
closed.text: Good afternoon! We have a need to purchase new electric stackers to work in our warehouse. Our current stackers are out of order and do not provide efficient movement of goods over short distances. We would like to order electric stackers with high load capacity and the ability to work in confined spaces.

closed.author: Emily Turner
closed.text: Hello, we need to purchase new paper rolls for printing invoices and documents in our warehouse. Our current rolls are running out and we need a large amount to run smoothly. We would like to order rolls of the appropriate size and quality.

closed.author: Matthew Murphy
closed.text: We have a need to purchase new shipping containers for the transportation of goods. Our current containers are worn out and do not provide reliable and safe transportation of goods. We would like to order containers of various sizes and modern designs.

closed.author: Edith Wright
closed.text: Hello, we are looking for an opportunity to purchase new office furniture for our company. We need tables, chairs, cabinets and other furniture to update our office space

closed.author: Maureen Miller
closed.text: We would like to purchase new equipment for our production line. We need new machines and tools to improve the efficiency and quality of our products.

closed.author: Sally Palmer
closed.text: We would like to purchase new equipment for our research and development department. We need new laboratory devices, tools and materials for conducting experiments and testing.

closed.author: Tony Nguyen
closed.text: Hello, we would like to purchase new equipment for our logistics department. We need new loading machines, palletizers and other tools to improve the efficiency of work and cargo handling.

motivated_refusals.author: Justin Swanson
motivated_refusals.text: We need new scales for weighing goods. I ask you to arrange the purchase of them.

motivated_refusals.author: Bernard Robinson
motivated_refusals.text: The purchase of new trucks is required to expand our fleet.

motivated_refusals.author: Alice Fuller
motivated_refusals.text: Hello, we need to purchase new software for our sales department. We are looking for a CRM system for customer database management, sales tracking and data analysis.

motivated_refusals.author: Rebecca Jones
motivated_refusals.text: We need new presentation displays, video equipment and other tools for marketing events and presentations.

motivated_refusals.author: Samuel Lee
motivated_refusals.text: We need new CAD stations, printers and other tools for the development of project documentation.

open.author: Edna Reyes
open.text: We need to purchase new pallets for the warehouse. Please arrange this purchase.

open.author: Angela Martinez
open.text: We're out of duct tape and packing tape. I ask you to arrange the order of new materials.

open.author: Timothy Castillo
open.text: Hello, I would like to order a new laptop for work. My current laptop is already outdated and freezes frequently, making it difficult to complete my tasks. I was looking for a suitable model and would like to purchase a Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon laptop.

open.author: Kevin Crawford
open.text: Hello, I would like to order a new printer for our department. Our current printer often breaks down and requires frequent repairs, which leads to downtime. I was looking for a reliable printer model and would like to purchase an HP LaserJet Pro M 402 dn printer.

open.author: Gregory Davis
open.text: Hello, we are out of printer cartridges. We need to purchase new cartridges for the HP OfficeJet Pro 6978 model. Please help us with the order.

open.author: Nicole Garcia
open.text: Hello, I would like to order a new chair for my workplace. My current chair has already worn out and become uncomfortable to sit in. I would like to purchase a chair with an ergonomic design and back support.

open.author: Albert Martin
open.text: Hello, we need to purchase new forklifts for warehouse work. We need to purchase models with a load capacity of at least 5 tons.

open.author: Rick Brooks
open.text: We have a need to purchase new pallet trucks for convenient work in the warehouse.

open.author: Bernard Robinson
open.text: Hello, we need to order new trucks to expand our fleet. It is required to purchase trucks with a load capacity of at least 10 tons and a comfortable cab for the driver.

open.author: Alice Gonzales
open.text: Hello, we have run out of packaging materials for the goods. We need to purchase a large number of cardboard boxes of different sizes and packing tape.

open.author: Jennie Soto
open.text: We have a need to purchase new storage racks. Our current shelving cannot cope with the growing volume of goods. We would like to order racks with a large load capacity and the ability to adjust the shelves.

open.author: Sandra Johnson
open.text: Hello, we have a need to purchase new barcode scanners for warehouse work. Our current scanners are outdated and unreliable. We would like to order scanners with fast scanning and wireless data transfer capability.

open.author: Helen Nelson
open.text: Hello, we need to update our logistics management software. Our current software is outdated and does not provide effective management of cargo transportation and warehouse operations. We would like to order software with a wide range of functions and the ability to integrate with other systems.

closed.author: Justin Newman
closed.text: We need to purchase new loaders for the warehouse. Please arrange this purchase.

closed.author: Rodney Johnson
closed.text: We have a need to purchase new racks for the warehouse. Please help us arrange this purchase.

closed.author: Bonnie Greer
closed.text: We have a need to purchase new fork attachments for loaders in our warehouse. Our current types are worn out and do not provide reliable fastening of loads. We would like to order forks of various load capacities and suitable for handling various types of cargo.

closed.author: David Wright
closed.text: Good afternoon! We need to purchase a new crane to perform lifting operations in our warehouse. Our current crane is out of order and does not provide reliable movement of heavy loads. We would like to order a crane with a high load capacity and the ability to work in various conditions.

closed.author: Sarah Lewis
closed.text: Hello, we have a need to purchase new data collection terminals to optimize the operation of our warehouse. Our current terminals are outdated and do not provide efficient collection and transmission of cargo information. We would like to order terminals with high performance, long service life and the ability to integrate with our logistics system.

closed.author: Daniel Turner
closed.text: Our current system does not allow us to effectively control inventory, track the movement of goods and process orders. We would like to order a modern system with inventory, reporting and integration functions with our other systems.

closed.author: Christopher Hill
closed.text: Good afternoon! We have a need to purchase new electric stackers to work in our warehouse. Our current stackers are out of order and do not provide efficient movement of goods over short distances. We would like to order electric stackers with high load capacity and the ability to work in confined spaces.

closed.author: Emily Turner
closed.text: Hello, we need to purchase new paper rolls for printing invoices and documents in our warehouse. Our current rolls are running out and we need a large amount to run smoothly. We would like to order rolls of the appropriate size and quality.

closed.author: Matthew Murphy
closed.text: We have a need to purchase new shipping containers for the transportation of goods. Our current containers are worn out and do not provide reliable and safe transportation of goods. We would like to order containers of various sizes and modern designs.

closed.author: Edith Wright
closed.text: Hello, we are looking for an opportunity to purchase new office furniture for our company. We need tables, chairs, cabinets and other furniture to update our office space

closed.author: Maureen Miller
closed.text: We would like to purchase new equipment for our production line. We need new machines and tools to improve the efficiency and quality of our products.

closed.author: Sally Palmer
closed.text: We would like to purchase new equipment for our research and development department. We need new laboratory devices, tools and materials for conducting experiments and testing.

closed.author: Tony Nguyen
closed.text: Hello, we would like to purchase new equipment for our logistics department. We need new loading machines, palletizers and other tools to improve the efficiency of work and cargo handling.

motivated_refusals.author: Justin Swanson
motivated_refusals.text: We need new scales for weighing goods. I ask you to arrange the purchase of them.

motivated_refusals.author: Bernard Robinson
motivated_refusals.text: The purchase of new trucks is required to expand our fleet.

motivated_refusals.author: Alice Fuller
motivated_refusals.text: Hello, we need to purchase new software for our sales department. We are looking for a CRM system for customer database management, sales tracking and data analysis.

motivated_refusals.author: Rebecca Jones
motivated_refusals.text: We need new presentation displays, video equipment and other tools for marketing events and presentations.

motivated_refusals.author: Samuel Lee
motivated_refusals.text: We need new CAD stations, printers and other tools for the development of project documentation.

open.author: Marie Thompson
open.text: There are problems with electricity in the warehouse. Please check and fix the problems.

open.author: Kim Clark
open.text: The generator needs to be repaired in the warehouse. It turns off periodically and does not provide reliable power.

open.author: Bonnie Moody
open.text: Hello, we have a problem with the electricity in our office. Some outlets have stopped working, and we can't connect computers and other equipment. We ask for help in solving this problem.

open.author: Violet Jenkins
open.text: We lost electricity in the office. All the lights are off and we can't continue working. Please send a specialist to restore the power supply.

open.author: Scott Adams
open.text: We have a problem with the electrical wiring in the office. We noticed that some sockets are heated and emit a burning smell. Please send a specialist immediately to check and fix the problem.

open.author: Mary Dixon
open.text: Hello, we have a problem with the electrical wires in our warehouse. Some of the fixtures are not working, and we are having difficulty finding the right products. We ask for help in solving this problem.

open.author: Marion Smith
open.text: There is a problem with the power supply of our server room. We noticed that some servers are periodically shut down, which can lead to data loss. Please send a specialist immediately to check and fix the problem.

open.author: Edith Wright
open.text: Hello, we have an electrical problem in our sales department. Some employees have noticed that their computers are periodically shut down, which prevents them from working. We ask for help in solving this problem

open.author: Anthony Paul
open.text: There is a problem with the electrical wiring in our conference room. Some outlets are not working, and we cannot hold important meetings and presentations. Please send a specialist to check and fix the problem.

open.author: Sara Rivera
open.text: Hello, we have a problem with the electrical wiring on the second floor of our building. There is no electricity in some rooms and we cannot continue working. Please send a specialist to check and fix the problem.

open.author: James Garcia
open.text: We noticed that some sockets are not working and we cannot use computers and other equipment. We ask for help in solving this problem

open.author: Jacob Warner
open.text: Some machines are periodically shut down, which leads to downtime and reduced productivity.

open.author: Valerie Curry
open.text: There was a problem with the electric lighting in the company's parking lot. Some lights do not work, which creates a danger for employees when returning home at night.

closed.author: Donna Baker
closed.text: There are periodic failures in the operation of the electrical network in the warehouse. This leads to delays in cargo handling. Please take action.

closed.author: Janice Cunningham
closed.text: It is necessary to check and fix the lighting problem in the warehouse. Some of the lights are not working.

closed.author: Kelly Miller
closed.text: Hello, we have a problem with electrical outlets in our development department. We noticed that some outlets are not working and we cannot connect our equipment.

closed.author: Catherine Bennett
closed.text: We noticed that some electric gates do not open, and this makes it difficult to load and unload goods. Please send a specialist immediately to check and fix the problem.

closed.author: Ken Rodriguez
closed.text: Some wires have been exposed, which poses a danger to our employees. Please send a specialist immediately to check and fix the problem.

closed.author: Willie Cruz
closed.text: Medical devices do not work stably, which may affect the quality of our medical care

closed.author: Edgar Brown
closed.text: Some outlets do not work, and this makes it difficult for us to charge and use our devices. We ask for help in solving this problem.

closed.author: Esther Black
closed.text: There is a problem with the power supply of our production line.

closed.author: Peter Hopkins
closed.text: Greetings! We have an unpleasant situation with electricity in our coworking. All of a sudden, all the outlets stopped working, and we can't charge our laptops and gadgets. This creates great inconvenience for our customers and disrupts the workflow.

closed.author: Mark Shaw
closed.text: Our refrigerator has stopped working, and we risk losing all the products. In addition, the electrical outlets in the kitchen are not functioning, which prevents us from cooking.

closed.author: Richard Smith
closed.text: Some cranes are periodically shut down, which leads to downtime and delays in loading and unloading operations. We ask you to send specialists promptly to check and troubleshoot the power supply of the cranes.

closed.author: Barbara Clark
closed.text: We have found that some electrical panels are overloaded and heating up to dangerous limits. This poses a serious threat to the safety of our staff and may lead to a fire.

closed.author: Mary Dixon
closed.text: Some conveyors are not working or are working intermittently, which seriously complicates the process of moving goods and leads to delays in deliveries.

motivated_refusals.author: Ashley White
motivated_refusals.text: Please check and fix the air conditioning problems in one of the warehouses. It is too hot there, which may affect the safety of goods.

motivated_refusals.author: Jennifer Dean
motivated_refusals.text: There was a need to install additional sockets in the warehouse to connect additional equipment. Please take action.

details: Cleaning of the territory and warehouses

open.author: Oscar Lee
open.text: I ask you to arrange transportation of employees from the company's office to the depot by motor transport.

open.author: Salvador Montgomery
open.text: I ask you to arrange the transportation of correspondence and documents to the territory of the company.

open.author: Diane Gordon
open.text: Please take/pick up the documents to the following addresses on 05/02/2024: 1) 2333 3/4 EAST LAKE AVE 90031-2933 (pre-pick up documents for signature at the personnel department); 2) 7701 HENEFER AVE 90045-1140 (pick up documents).

open.author: Ann Hill
open.text: To load scrap metal, please arrange the delivery of cargo buckets. Please schedule the work for May 2-3 and inform us in advance to get a pass.

open.author: Nora Coleman
open.text: Transportation is required for electrical work at the northern branch. Route: pick up the electrician in the morning and take him to the northern branch, bring him back in the evening. Preferably on May 2 or 3.

closed.author: Tommy Hudson
closed.text: I ask you to arrange transportation of employees to meet clients in another city.

closed.author: Lois Phillips
closed.text: It is required to export special equipment from our warehouse to the client's territory. We ask you to arrange transportation.

closed.author: Gertrude Brown
closed.text: Please provide a company car on 04/27/2024 at 14.00 for the trip (without waiting)

closed.author: Rick Christensen
closed.text: Please provide it on April 26, 2024. (Friday) the ZiL Ilosos car for the continuation of work from April 25, 2024 - pumping meltwater from the berth No. 1 sites, the cargo terminal and the checkpoint building.

closed.author: Gladys Turner
closed.text: Colleagues, good afternoon. Please pick up correspondence from the secretary on 04/22/2024 (Mon) and take it to the Main Post Office.

closed.author: Rick Brooks
closed.text: Good afternoon! Please take the documents

closed.author: Henry Martin
closed.text: Good afternoon. It is necessary to take the documents to the insurance company for signature

closed.author: Cynthia Roberts
closed.text: For cleaning the territory from snow and pumping out meltwater. I ask on 04/12/2024 to provide the household area with the following equipment: 1) Front loader 1 unit; 2) Dump truck 1 unit; 3) Brush 1 unit; 4) Ilosos 1 unit.

closed.author: Aaron Wallace
closed.text: Good morning! Please pump out the water at the gas station. The approach is impossible.

closed.author: Anthony Paul
closed.text: Good morning, please provide special equipment for snow removal in a grid with lumber. urgently!!!

closed.author: Johnny Graves
closed.text: Good afternoon. Please take the toner cartridge to the northern branch

closed.author: Bonnie Parker
closed.text: I ask you to replace the wiper blades on Nissan No. 584 and top up the windshield washer fluid.

closed.author: Virginia Ross
closed.text: I ask you to provide vehicles for the delivery of flagpoles

closed.author: Paul Sanders
closed.text: Pick up measuring instruments (periodically checked) at 4823 W SLAUSON AVE APT 1

motivated_refusals.author: Sandra Johnson
motivated_refusals.text: Good afternoon! We need to arrange transportation of employees to a corporate event in another city. Please provide a comfortable bus for a certain date. Thanks!

motivated_refusals.author: Marie Thompson
motivated_refusals.text: Good afternoon! Please arrange transportation of employees from the airport to our head office building. We ask you to provide comfortable cars. Thanks!

motivated_refusals.author: Jacob Warner
motivated_refusals.text: Please provide a company car on 04/25/2024 at 13.00 for the trip

motivated_refusals.author: Frank James
motivated_refusals.text: Good afternoon, around 10-00 (by additional agreement) it is necessary to deliver 3 people (representatives of the cargo owner) from the hotel to the site

motivated_refusals.author: Regina Roberts
motivated_refusals.text: Good afternoon! I ask you to provide me with a vehicle on 04/11/2024 at 13.00 for an on-site inspection of compliance with the requirements for labor protection of the site

info_create_task.name_category: Electric and gas welding, gas cutting works
details: Welding repair of water supply networks

open.author: Esther Black
open.text: Hello! Our shipping belt in the warehouse was damaged. We ask you to arrange its repair and restoration of work. Thanks!

open.author: Willard Bennett
open.text: Good afternoon! We need to carry out maintenance of our fleet. Please arrange for the inspection and repair of all vehicles. Thanks!

closed.author: Bernard Robinson
closed.text: Hello! We are having problems with the operation of the conveyor in the warehouse. I ask you to appoint a specialist for its examination and repair. Thanks!

closed.author: Dorothy Brown
closed.text: Good afternoon! We need to set up and maintain our fleet of loaders. We ask you to arrange the work of a specialist on the specified date. Thanks!

motivated_refusals.author: Angela Alvarez
motivated_refusals.text: Good afternoon! We need to carry out maintenance and configuration of our freight elevator in the warehouse. We ask you to appoint a specialist to perform the work. Thanks!

motivated_refusals.author: Joy Lewis
motivated_refusals.text: Hello! We have a problem with the operation of the lifting crane in the warehouse. Please send a specialist for inspection and repair. It is urgently necessary to restore the operation of the crane. Thanks!

details: Manufacture of containers for transporting lamps

open.author: Lisa Dean
open.text: Hello! We require the services of a carpenter for the manufacture of wooden structures in the warehouse. Please appoint a responsible specialist. Thanks!

open.author: Amy Roberts
open.text: Good afternoon! We need the services of a carpenter to repair wooden furniture in the office. I ask you to appoint a specialist to perform the work. Thanks!

closed.author: Bonnie Greer
closed.text: Hello! We need the help of a carpenter to install wooden partitions in the warehouse. Please appoint a responsible specialist. Thanks!

closed.author: Helen Higgins
closed.text: Greetings! We need the services of a carpenter to build wooden shelves in the warehouse. Please appoint a specialist for this task. Thanks!

motivated_refusals.author: Erica Rodriguez
motivated_refusals.text: Hello! We require the services of a carpenter to replace wooden doors in the office. Please appoint a responsible specialist. Thanks!

motivated_refusals.author: Sharon Ford
motivated_refusals.text: Hi! We need to fix the wooden floors in the warehouse. Please assign a carpenter to do this job. Thanks!
